createRefund

InvoicePayment createRefund(UUID paymentId,
                            BigDecimal amount,
                            boolean isInvoiceAdjusted,
                            Map<UUID,BigDecimal> invoiceItemIdsWithAmounts,
                            UUID paymentCookieId,
                            InternalCallContext context)
                            throws InvoiceApiException
Create a refund.

Parameters:
paymentId - payment associated with that refund
amount - amount to refund
isInvoiceAdjusted - whether the refund should trigger an invoice or invoice item adjustment
invoiceItemIdsWithAmounts - invoice item ids and associated amounts to adjust
paymentCookieId - payment cookie id
context - the call context
Returns:
the created invoice payment object associated with this refund
Throws:
InvoiceApiException
